Judul: ANALYSIS OF THE APPLICATION KREDIT USAHA RAKYAT (KUR) ON ISLAMIC BANKING IN INDONESIA (Case study : The Application of KUR at Bank Syariah Mandiri)
Abstrak: One of the government programs in maintaining economic growth are government support for the creation of small businesses and a new medium businesses with the Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) program. Since President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono launched it on November 5, 2007, the number of KUR has reached Rp. 6.8 trillion by 672 thousand debtors. When compared with other types of credit, the growth of KUR is almost Rp. 1 trillion per month is a remarkable achievement. In KUR program, the government assisted by 19 bank to channel funds. The Interesting point is from the 19 Bank was there a bank that uses a system of profit sharing or known by the name of Islamic Banking (Sharia Bank). Looking from history of Islamic Banking in Indonesia, it seems natural that many people judge Islamic Bank cannot compete with others conventional banks. However, consider the facts, with the growth of Islamic Bank are so quick to indicate that the Islamic Bank has interesting programs. It is one of the reasons why many customers move to Islamic Bank. In this study, the authors intend to examine how competing Islamic Banking system can compensate for the results of conventional banks, especially in the KUR financing program. And show how the applications of KUR program in practice on Bank Syariah Mandiri. This paper also assessed any option contract that can be select by the Islamic Bank to face of this KUR program. Results of the study are KUR program in Bank Syariah Mandiri run by converting interest into contract with the revenue sharing agreement with musharakah and murabahah scheme. To be able impose KUR sharia program without using the conversion of interest rate, it is advisable to creating new model with using the modified of 5C approach to capture the difference of industrial sector and time of loan is the determinant of profit sharing ratio.
